title.narrative: WASH ACTIVITIES INCLUDING DISTRIBUTION OF CRITICAL WASH SUPPLIES_COVID - 19

description.narrative: Work closely with network of corporate partners to source and deliver hygiene kits and targeted communication to vulnerable families in poor urban neighborhoods in Brazilian capital cities in response of the COVID-19 Pandemic, which contributes to Sanitation, Sanitation (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, the most excluded boys and girls benefit from enhanced and inclusive public policies and services and actively participate in decision making processes.*Children most expected to benefit: Afro-descendant, Quilombolas, indigenous people, children with disabilities, with HIV/AIDS, in rural areas and in vulnerable urban territories, LGBT youth.

participating-org.narrative: ASSOC VOLUNTARIOS PARA O SERVICO INTERNACIONAL
FUNDACAO PARA O DESENVOLVIMENTO CIENTIFICO E TECNOLOGICO EM SAUDE
